attributes.action: Football Fans To Pay £20 A month to watch all premier league football on TV
attributes.additional_details: During the pandemic people have relied on the return of football and without, life is not the same. During these financially worrying times and the fact no one can enter stadiums football should follow TWENTY IS PLENTY !!
attributes.background: Make Major broadcasting companies remove pay-per-view and make it one £20 payment a month

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for broadcasters and the football authorities.
